title.rendered: Financial Commission Participating in IFX EXPO International in Limassol – Cyprus

content.rendered:
Come see our Exhibitor Booth № 100 at IFX Expo International this May in Cyprus!

The Financial Commission will be exhibiting at the 2017 IFX Expo International which will take place on 23-25 May, 2017 at Spyros Kyprianou Centre, Polemidia, Limassol 3080, Cyprus.

The organization joins a list of more than 3000 attendees, 38 Industry Professional Speakers and over 100 confirmed exhibitors and representatives from hundreds of financial services providers expected to attend the exclusive industry gathering.

The Importance of Industry Events:

Since May 2012 IFX Expo has connected over 30,000 attendees with over 1,000 services providers from around the world at our renowned expos in Limassol and Hong Kong.

The announcement follows prior events that the Financial Commission participated in including in Cyprus, Hong Kong, England, Russia, Belarus, Ukraine and Shanghai.

Participation in the IFX Expo event supports the industry and provides market participants with the chance to learn more about how the Financial Commission operates.

 


The iFX EXPO is the premiere finance business to business expo uniting more than hundred of exhibitors and more than three thousands of attendees from all around the world.This includes how the organization is helping its members improve the services they offer to clients using a 3rd party dispute resolution process afforded via membership status within the Financial Commission.

  • There will be top executives of the leading cutting edge marketing firms, technology, payments, service and fx / binary platform providers from Europe, Asia and across the world.
  • The event supports various aspects of the financial services space in foreign exchange and related markets through various collaborative means covering a wide range of topics from Marketing and how to improve client acquisition to Technology and industry innovation.
  • The Financial Commission will demonstrate its value to participants through its exhibitor booth where representatives from the organization will explain the benefits provided by membership with the Financial Commission.

In addition, the Financial Commission expects to meet new market participants who could be potential candidate member firms, including Forex, CFD and Cryptocurrency related brokerages and technology developers.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org
